neuralprocesses.disc module¶

class neuralprocesses.disc.Discretisation(points_per_unit, multiple=1, margin=0.1, dim=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

Discretisation.

Parameters

  • points_per_unit (float) – Density of the discretisation.

  • multiple (int, optional) – Always produce a discretisation which is a multiple of this number. Defaults to 1.

  • margin (float, optional) – Leave this much space around the most extremal points. Defaults to 0.1.

  • dim (int, optional) – Dimensionality of the inputs.

resolution¶

Resolution of the discretisation. Equal to the inverse of points_per_unit.

Type

float

multiple¶

Always produce a discretisation which is a multiple of this number.

Type

int

margin¶

Leave this much space around the most extremal points.

Type

float

dim¶

Dimensionality of the inputs.

Type

int

discretise_1d(*args, margin)[source]¶

Perform the discretisation for one-dimensional inputs.

Parameters

  • *args (input) – One-dimensional inputs.

  • margin (float) – Leave this much space around the most extremal points.

Returns

Discretisation.

Return type

tensor
